PageInfo.Message:
Information about <COL ffdc78>"Hidden World
Quests" that have not yet been published in
Lestania News can be purchased from "World Quest
Information" by talking to the "Area Master" in
each area.</COL>
Check the recommended level and purchase
information about the World Quest you want to try.
You can also check the published information at
the same time!

You can check various information such as the
location of the order, the monsters to defeat, the
quest objectives, and the rewards upon completion.
Use the World Quest information to challenge many
undiscovered quests.
